original_title: Billy Blanks Tae Bo Abs & Glutes
overview: Billy Blanks, 7-time World Martial Arts Champion and creator of the award winning Taebo work-out routine, brings you Abs and Glutes, a routine of specially-targeted Taebo workouts. In the Abs & Glutes work-out, Billy takes you through the moves required to tone up all of those elusive muscles! Taebo will help you get results right where you want them. Taebo Abs and Glutes is a concentrated blast of pure Billy Blanks energy, spirit and power that will help you tone your stomach and buttock areas, while burning fat and building strength in these two important musclegroups. As soon as you start the workout, you'll know that this is the most fun you can have while getting result you want! this is the perfect way to tone-up your muscles and keep in shape-while enjoying the Billy Blanks routine.
title: Billy Blanks Tae Bo Abs & Glutes
